channel.title: LoadBalances on WNCBB's blog
channel.description: Recent content in LoadBalances on WNCBB's blog

item.title: LoadBalance
item.description: 轮询法 加权轮询法 平滑加权轮询法(smooth weighted round robin algorithm) before: c:(0, 0, 0) w:(5, 1, 1) mid: c:(5, 1, 1) w:(5, 1, 1) select_by_current: a sum_of_weight: 7 after: c:(-2, 1, 1) w:(5, 1, 1) ---------------------- before: c:(-2, 1, 1) w:(5, 1, 1) mid: c:(3, 2, 2) w:(5, 1, 1) select_by_current: a sum_of_weight: 7 after: c:(-4, 2, 2) w:(5, 1, 1) ---------------------- before: c:(-4, 2, 2) w:(5, 1, 1) mid: c:(1, 3, 3) w:(5, 1, 1) select_by_current: b sum_of_weight: 7 after: c:(1, -4, 3) w:(5, 1, 1) ---------------------- before: c:(1, -4, 3) w:(5, 1, 1) mid: c:(6, -3, 4) w:(5, 1, 1) select_by_current: a sum_of_weight: 7 after: c:(-1, -3, 4) w:(5, 1, 1) ---------------------- before: c:(-1, -3, 4) w:(5, 1, 1) mid: c:(4, -2, 5) w:(5, 1, 1) select_by_current: c sum_of_weight: 7 after: c:(4, -2, -2) w:(5, 1, 1) ---------------------- before: c:(4, -2, -2) w:(5, 1, 1) mid: c:(9, -1, -1) w:(5, 1, 1) select_by_current: a sum_of_weight: 7 after: c:(2, -1, -1) w:(5, 1, 1) ---------------------- before: c:(2, -1, -1) w:(5, 1, 1) mid: c:(7, 0, 0) w:(5, 1, 1) select_by_current: a sum_of_weight: 7 after: c:(0, 0, 0) w:(5, 1, 1) 随机法
